message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $13,500 is fair. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,750?
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I'm still aiming to keep the cost lower. Could we possibly agree on $12,000?
